{"id":777981388,"lang":"python3","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1660935587,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"101 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/777981388/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"14 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def convert(self, s: str, numRows: int) -> str:\n        if numRows==1: return s\n        \n        res=\"\"\n        for r in range(numRows):\n            increment=2*(numRows-1)\n            for i in range(r,len(s),increment):\n                res+=s[i]\n                if (r>0 and r<numRows-1 and i+increment-2*r<len(s)):\n                    res+=s[i+increment-2*r]\n        return res\n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
